    • Uses of Task in com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common

      Methods in com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task Task.start()
      Starts this Task the very next tick
      Task Task.start(long delay)
      Starts this Task after the delay specified
      Task Task.start(long delay, long interval)
      Starts this Task after the delay specified, and keeps running it at the interval
      Task Task.stop()
      Stops this Task from executing
